projects: [{"title":"Softbank Vision fund 2 Analysis","start_date":"Oct 2019","end_date":"Oct 2019","description":"The goal of the project was to analyze the impact of Vision Fund 2 on Softbank and the associated companies with it in general. Along with a team of 4 members I had conducted extensive research on Softbank's current working strategy and it's method of functioning. We had suggested how the fund should be rolled out in the market in most dominant fields so as to obtain maximum Return On Investment. The link here consists a ppt for the project that we had presented ."}]
